data.text: @taguelprincess Hi, Alice, please call our service center at +61-2-9262-6000 about this matter. Thanks. /JN
Enjoy a special travel experience, please visit our duty free showcase when you on board our A380. /JN https://t.co/p4iIpjgxzB
@NadiaLee We can't wait to welcome your family aboard. Have a great birthday flight. /JN
@FlyerTalkerinA2 Hi, we start the check in service at 20:15. Visit https://t.co/UxLXUnDV0F for our schedule and service. Thanks. /JN
RT @woody2190: .@KoreanAir_KE took delivery of HL7637 today. https://t.co/VJO3gkew56
@woody2190 Cool shots. Thanks for the updates. /JN
The junk boat is a symbol of #HongKong. Have you ever tried the junk cruise? /JN #TTOT https://t.co/frF1o8UxQP
RT @jpnicosia: #avgeek @KoreanAir_KE https://t.co/Ubc7gf62wB
@jpnicosia That's beautiful. Thanks for sharing. /JN
@g33uu Glad you enjoyed our service. We look forward to serving you again on your next journey. /JN
@KimmyTornado Thank you for flying with us. We hope you'll the same great flight as the previous one. /JN
[World Academies │ British Racing School] Off to the races. Read this feature at https://t.co/idf1n7cg4m  /JN https://t.co/tShoGrCm00
@Evadlee Hi, please click this link to search the left behind item https://t.co/fzG6L0ARjI or call 886-3-383-3247/8 to check it out. /JN
Life is better when you’re smiling. /JN #MondayMotivation https://t.co/RL9pC7Vm8A
@clinteas If you like to share details about your experience, please let us know at  https://t.co/QWqOOTinJO Thanks. /JN
RT @n74jmt: I see some @KoreanAir_KE love from the KAL Lounge.  777 LOVE HL8216 https://t.co/IHvFbMzIbo
@n74jmt Nice photo. Thanks for sharing. /JN
@n74jmt Hope you had a pleasant flight with us. /JN
@muathsBameer Hi, we'll send the card to you if your registered address is in Saudi Arabia, Thanks. /JN
@FionnJameson Pls contact our office in your landing airport about this matter. Visit https://t.co/UxLXUnVvSd to search the number. Tks. /JN
@Sir_EJRT12 Glad you enjoyed our service, Earl. The photos are nice. /JN
@BinoDelaPaz We suggest you to contact our airport office in your region to check out any restriction about this issue. Thanks. /JN
@EmreKanik That looks cool in BW. Thanks for sharing, Emre. /JN
@realJayManzano Thanks for flying with us, Jay. We hope to see you again on your next flight. /JN
@YAN89515 Thanks for being with us. We hope to see you again soon. /JN
RT @Speedbird0815: Hello to #OSL. A successful start for Charter Flights @KoreanAir_KE @KoreanAir_News https://t.co/KOfAoQDpGk
@Speedbird0815 @KoreanAir_News Truly awesome. Thanks for sharing. /JN
RT @JetPhotosNet: A @KoreanAir_KE 777 in Sky Team livery taxiing in Prague. https://t.co/7B5xfNdUqs © Al-Aian Lebeda https://t.co/kGCtEyyC7I
@JetPhotosNet That's nice. Thanks for sharing. /JN
@TheHusbandInTow Happy anniversary, Eric. Thanks for sharing that lovely photo with us. /JN
@www16Right @SydneyAirport We will let you know if we have plan to use this aircraft on the Sydney route. Thanks. /JN
@gk_anto @Vantharith Yes, the validity of the award ticket is 1 year. Please visit https://t.co/UxLXUnVvSd for more. Thanks. /JN
This is the seat map of our #B7478i aircraft, what’s your favorite seat? /JN https://t.co/ocvXTiBKw8
@gk_anto The layover hotel may not be available for certain periods. Please contact your local Korean Air to check it out. Thanks. /JN
@MPengl Please DM us your name, booking reference, ticket number and what kind of seat you preferred. Thanks. /JN
@skylineowl Yes, it is.  Busan is a great city, please come and explore more exciting things here. /JN
Good Morning! If you come to #Seoul this weekend. We wish you have a pleasant stay here. /JN https://t.co/jkFUfYO96F
@binodnrn Yes, that is our service hotline in Japan. Thanks. /JN
@patmurphy747 @zrh_airport @Easyspotting Beautiful shots. Thanks for sharing, Pat. /JN

RT @petchmo: ✈️📷 #avgeek photo of the day and #tbt to April 2014. 

@KoreanAir_KE landing at @fly2ohare. https://t.co/4rVXXKygPW
@petchmo @fly2ohare Nice photo. Thank you, Ian. /JN
@liv_draper We're honored, Olivia. /JN
@curimedia Great shot. Thanks for sharing. /JN
RT @Chrisalejomonro: @KoreanAir_KE beautiful Queen https://t.co/IvsEz1aMKu
@Chrisalejomonro We couldn't agree more. Truly beautiful. Thanks for sharing, Christian. /JN
@o4megot You have a great day too. /JN
Hello, Skypass member, we’ve just released the latest statement, please check your email box. Thank you. /JN https://t.co/US1TUY5gUg
@TravisKraft Perhaps email your request to this address mnlsmr@koreanair.com. Thanks. /JN
We serve 4 weekly flights between Seoul and #Auckland. See you aboard. /JN https://t.co/wQwpyZgX7E
@richardLondon HI, Richard, please contact our service center in your region about this matter. Thanks. /JN

@AndrewWorth96 Thanks your comment about us. We look forward to welcoming you on board again. /JN
@dearestpenelope Hi, Jessica, please let us know how we may help you,. /JN
@MsVillasana Glad you enjoyed our service. We hope to see you again on your next journey. /JN
@n74jmt Thank you for flying with us. We look forward to welcoming you aboard again. /JN
@Vantharith More about Skypass award and conditions could be found at https://t.co/m4raB1oEv3 Thanks. /JN

You probably know the validity of our #Skypass bonus tickets.
If not, check this out. /JN https://t.co/lDqUdtKpqv
@lana_pat_ @jetairways Please share your thoughts at https://t.co/eNCNafN2SZ Select 'Guest' if not our Skypass member.Thanks. /JN
@lana_pat_ @jetairways Sorry for the inconvenience. Hope you'll have a pleasant flight. /JN
@lana_pat_ @jetairways due seat selection for economy class closed 48 hrs, Business & First class closed 24 hrs before departure. Tks./JN
@lana_pat_ @jetairways Regret that we didn't know your exact schedule before this moment. Please raise your seat request at the airport...
@lana_pat_ @jetairways Please contact the operated carrier about this matter. Thanks. /JN
@lana_pat_ @jetairways We regret that web check-in is not allowed for codeshare flights operated by other carriers. /JN
@pollothai1 @JetBlue We can't wait to welcome you on board. /JN
Happiness is flying high in the sky. Join us to feel it. /JN #Avgeek #A380 https://t.co/vxquDIo8O3
@lana_pat_ @jetairways Hi, if your flight number starts with KE, you may process web check-in. Thanks. /JN
@GWOF We truly regret about this. If you like to share details about your experience, pls let us know on https://t.co/QWqOOTinJO Thanks. /JN
@n74jmt @Dulles_Airport Hope you had a pleasant flight and thanks for sharing the image with us. Very nice indeed. /JN
@guidethe Hi, please send us your request on https://t.co/QWqOOTinJO Thanks. ./JN
@pollothai1 @JetBlue Thank you for flying with us, Tommy. We look forward to serving you again soon. /JN
@samueldjesus_22 Thanks, Samuel, we can't wait to welcome you on board again. /JN
Today, #SummerSolstice marks the summer is officially coming. Have a happy summer. /JN https://t.co/9afSVgf12I
#HuaHin is a seaside resort in #Thailand. /JN #TTOT https://t.co/YlbPb8mTVz
@JarheadPAO Hi, Danny, please contact your local Korean Air to select your seat. Thanks. /JN
@MsVillasana Have a nice flight, Jill. /JN
@SamChipperfield @HeathrowAirport Amazing shots. Thanks for sharing, Sam. /JN

@christian_clc Please check our website and the availability according to your travel dates, thank you. /AC

@gelowww23 If you need any assistance, please call our service hotline. Thanks. /JN
[Contemporary Korea │ Dokseodang-ro] Avenue of the Arts. Read this feature at https://t.co/idf1n7cg4m  /JN https://t.co/KiqzrZT4RN
@gelowww23 Hi, Angelo, our service hotline in the Philippines is +63-2-789-3700. Thanks. /JN
@PRicanFilmmaker @TANEROZBEL @GuyAndHisCamera Nice video. Thanks for sharing, /JN
@mihwannie If not, please DM us your name, booking reference, ticket number and what kind of seat you want to assign. Thanks. /JN
@nicejobbuddy We suggest you to contact Ethiad to check the miles of your itinerary. Thanks. /JN
@mainjew You may visit https://t.co/UxLXUnVvSd to check our online promotional fares from time to time. Thanks. /JN
@nicejobbuddy It doesn't matter. Please let us know if you've further questions. /JN
@nicejobbuddy Yes, if you fly Ehihad on 31AUG2016, T class is eligible to earn 25% Skypass miles. Thanks. /JN
@nicejobbuddy If you viewed the miles of Ethiad, please note the year was 2015.Thanks. /JN
@nicejobbuddy The eligibility of earning miles is based on the departure date. Thanks. /JN
@nicejobbuddy Miles will not be credited before flight departure. Thanks. /JN

@mihwannie If your Skypass is included in your booking, please login account to select your seat. Thanks. /JN
@gabriellestorrs We regret that we've no authority to upgrade any passenger here. We wish you have a pleasant journey. /JN
@RiandyGaruda Those products are available in Korea, if you presently locate in Korea, please call 1544-4060. Thanks. /JN
@artshimko Glad you enjoyed our service, we look forward to flying with you again. /JN
